class.name: SymbolPlotting
class.documentation: This action routine (and C++object) controls the plotting of meteorological and marker symbols.

parameter.name: legend
parameter.documentation: Turn legend on or off (ON/OFF) : New Parameter!

parameter.name: symbol_type
parameter.documentation: Defines the type of symbol plotting required

parameter.name: symbol_table_mode
parameter.documentation: Specifies if plotting is to be in advanced, table (on) or individual mode (off). Note: The simple table mode is not recommended anymore, try to use the advanced mode instead, this should give you easier control of the plot.

parameter.name: symbol_format
parameter.documentation: Format used to plot values (MAGICS Format/(AUTOMATIC))

parameter.name: symbol_outline
parameter.documentation: Add an outline to each symbol

parameter.name: symbol_outline_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the outline

parameter.name: symbol_outline_thickness
parameter.documentation: thickness of the outline

parameter.name: symbol_outline_style
parameter.documentation: Line Style of outline

parameter.name: symbol_connect_line
parameter.documentation: Connect all the symbols with a line

parameter.name: symbol_connect_automatic_line_colour
parameter.documentation: if on, will use the colour of the symbol

parameter.name: symbol_connect_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the connecting line

parameter.name: symbol_connect_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: thickness of the connecting line

parameter.name: symbol_connect_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line Style of connecting line

class.name: SymbolIndividualMode
class.documentation: Here comes the description of the SymbolIndividualMode object

parameter.name: legend_user_text
parameter.documentation: if set, the text to be shown for the symbol group in the legend

parameter.name: symbol_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of symbols.

parameter.name: symbol_height
parameter.documentation: Height of symbols.

parameter.name: symbol_marker_mode
parameter.documentation: Method to select a marker : by name, by index, by image : in that case, Magics will use an external image as marker.

parameter.name: symbol_marker_index
parameter.documentation: Marker indice: An integer between 1 and 28

parameter.name: symbol_marker_name
parameter.documentation: Symbol name. Choose in a list of available markers dot/circle/ww_00 ...

parameter.name: symbol_image_path
parameter.documentation: Path to the image

parameter.name: symbol_image_format
parameter.documentation: Format of the image file. If set to AUTOMATIC, the file extension will be used to determine the file type.

parameter.name: symbol_image_width
parameter.documentation: width of the image

parameter.name: symbol_image_height
parameter.documentation: height of the image

parameter.name: symbol_text_list
parameter.documentation: list of texts to plot

parameter.name: symbol_text_position
parameter.documentation: Position of the text

parameter.name: symbol_text_font_name
parameter.documentation: Font to use

parameter.name: symbol_text_font_size
parameter.documentation: Font size

parameter.name: symbol_text_font_style
parameter.documentation: Font style

parameter.name: symbol_text_font_colour
parameter.documentation: Font colour.

parameter.name: symbol_text_blanking
parameter.documentation: blanking of the text

parameter.name: symbol_legend_height
parameter.documentation: If set, the height will be used to plot the symbols in the legend

class.name: SymbolTableMode
class.documentation: Here comes the description of the SymbolTableMode object

parameter.name: symbol_min_table
parameter.documentation: Table of minimum values. The table is used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MAX_TABLE

parameter.name: symbol_max_table
parameter.documentation: Table of maximum values. The table is used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MIN_TABLE

parameter.name: symbol_marker_table
parameter.documentation: Table of MARKER indices. The table is to be used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MIN_TABLE and SYMBOL_MAX_TABLE

parameter.name: symbol_name_table
parameter.documentation: Table of Symbol names. The table is to be used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MIN_TABLE and SYMBOL_MAX_TABLE

parameter.name: symbol_colour_table
parameter.documentation: Table of SYMBOL colours. T The table is to be used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MIN_TABLE and SYMBOL_MAX_TABLE

parameter.name: symbol_height_table
parameter.documentation: Table of SYMBOL heights. The table is to be used in conjunction with SYMBOL_MIN_TABLE and SYMBOL_MAX_TABLE

class.name: SymbolAdvancedTableMode
class.documentation: Here comes the description of the SymbolTableMode object

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_selection_type
parameter.documentation: Technique to use to calculate the shading band levels.
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_level_selection_type sent to new Magics[IsoPlot].

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_min_value
parameter.documentation: Min value to plot

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_max_value
parameter.documentation: Max value to plot

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_count
parameter.documentation: Count or number of levels to be plotted. Magics will try to find "nice levels", this means that the number of levels could be slightly different from the requested number of levels

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_tolerance
parameter.documentation: Tolerance: Do not use "nice levels" if the number of levels is really to different [count +/- tolerance]

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_interval
parameter.documentation: Interval in data units between different bands of shading

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_reference_level
parameter.documentation: Level from which the level interval is calculated

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_list
parameter.documentation: List of shading band levels to be plotted

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the colours of the bands in polygon shading

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_max_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Highest shading band colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_min_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Lowest shading band colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_direction
parameter.documentation: Direction of colour sequencing for plotting (CLOCKWISE/ ANTI_CLOCKWISE)

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_list
parameter.documentation: List of colours to be used in symbol plotting

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of colours is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_marker_list
parameter.documentation: List of markers to be used in symbol plotting

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_marker_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of markers is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the height

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_max_value
parameter.documentation: Maximum height to use

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_min_value
parameter.documentation: Mininimum height to use

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_list
parameter.documentation: List of heights to be used

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of heights is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_list
parameter.documentation: Text to display

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of text is smaller that the list of intervals lastone: reuse the last one, cycle: return to the fisrt one

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_name
parameter.documentation: Font to use for text plotting.

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_size
parameter.documentation: Font size

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_style
parameter.documentation: Font Style

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_colour
parameter.documentation: Symbol Colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_display_type
parameter.documentation: How to display text none:do not display it centre : display it instead of the symbol, right : attached it to the right of the symbol, top : attached it to the top of the symbol, bottom: attached it to the bottom of the symbol,

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_method
parameter.documentation: outlayer method

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_min_value
parameter.documentation: outlayer min value

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_max_value
parameter.documentation: outlayer max value
